projectName: Data Mart-based Dashboard for Kickstarter Dataset
description: The project builds a data mart and dashboard to analyze Kickstarter data using SQL, Python, and Tableau for visualization.

projectName: Dashboard Project Campaign Using Kickstarter Dataset
description: The project uses Tableau to visualize Kickstarter campaign data, providing insights into performance metrics.
The Northwind Sales Dashboard visualizes sales data, offering insights into performance and customer behavior using Tableau.
This project uses Tableau to visualize Seattle building permits data, providing insights into permit types, locations, and issuance trends.

projectName: Creating Interactive Charts and Metrics in Tableau
description: This project showcases a data visualization dashboard created with Tableau, highlighting key insights from a dataset through interactive charts and metrics.
